text.0: where hath the hymn with reverence like an envoy found both fair gods today invoked of many.
text.1: hymn that hath brought the two nāsatyas hither to this mans thought be ye both gods most friendly.
text.2: come readily to this mine invocation lauded with songs that ye may drink the juices.
text.3: compass this house to keep it from the foeman that none may force it either near or distant.
text.4: juice in wide room hath been prepared to feast you for you the grass is strewn most soft to tread on.
text.5: with lifted hands your servant hath adored you yearningfor you the pressstones shed the liquid.
text.6: agni uplifts him at your sacrifices forth goes the oblation dropping oil and glowing.
text.7: up stands the gratefulminded priest elected appointed to invoke the two nāsatyas.
text.8: lords of great wealth for glory sūryas daughter mounted your car that brings a hundred succours.
text.9: famed for your magic arts were ye magicians amid the race of gods ye dancing heroes.
text.10: ye twain with these your glories fair to look on brought to win victory rich gifts for sūrya.
text.11: after you flew your birds marvels of beauty dear to our hearts the song well lauded reached you.
text.12: may your winged coursers best to draw nāsatyas convey you to the object of your wishes.
text.13: swift as the thought your car hath been sent onward to food of many a sort and dainty viands.
text.14: lords of great wealth manifold is your bounty ye filled our cow with food that never faileth.
text.15: lovers of sweetness yours are praise and singers and poured libations which have sought your favour.
text.16: mine were two mares of puraya brown swiftfooted a hundred with sumidha food with peruk.
text.17: sanda gave ten golddecked and welltrained horses tame and obedient and of lofty stature.
text.18: nāsatyas purupanthas offered hundreds thousands of steeds to him who sang your praises.
text.19: gave heroes to the singer bharadvāja yewonderworkers let the fiends be slaughtered.
text.20: may i with princes share your bliss in freedom.
